reviewText: I am currently a student and all of these DVDs have provide me with valuable content for essays, exams, and my own projects.  I am glad I found this series from A2ZCDs.
"I used to be a film student, so I was very curious when I saw that you guys had some of the original Jam Handy shorts. I'm glad I ordered these DVDs. The film quality is incredible!"
"This is the place to get your DVDs. You can't ask for more! Extremely Professional, Extremely Reliable and Extremely Fast. A++" Thanks,
